title.rendered: STEDI NISSAN NAVARA NP300 PIGGY BACK ADAPTOR ONLY

content.rendered:
Nissan Navara NP300 Driving Light Piggy Back High Beam Adapter

OVERVIEW

The easy solution for wiring up your LED Driving Lights to your Nissan D23 Navara NP300 with no need for grafting or splicing as it is a direct Plug & Play install. We also have a complete harness kit for the NP300 which is available in DT or DTP.

PIGGY BACK

Performing like any other piggy back adaptor hooking straight into the back of the headlight & running through the harness set up is quick and easy.

COMPATABILITY

IMPORTANT! Our NP300 Piggy Back Adaptor is very unlikely to work with other Plug & Play harnesses on the market. Our STEDI Quick Fit Harness has built-in electronics to deal with the negative switching found in the NP300 Navara. Be aware of using this adaptor with other generic harnesses will likely cause the headlight module to fail.

DETAILS

Designed to work with all STEDI Quick Fit Wiring Harnesses.

 

SPECIFICATIONS

CONNECTOR TYPE Nissan D23 NP300 Navara LED Head Light Adapter

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x Nissan D23 NP300 Navara LED Head Light Adapter

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI NISSAN NAVARA NP300 PIGGY BACK ADAPTER ONLY

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
